name: AXDataPoint
desc: An object that represents a single data point in a chart.

items.name: init(x: String, y: Double?, additionalValues: [AXDataPoint.Value], label: String?)
items.desc: Creates a data point with the specified X value, Y value, additional values, and label.

items.name: init(x: Double, y: Double?, additionalValues: [AXDataPoint.Value], label: String?)
items.desc: Creates a data point with the specified X value, Y value, additional values, and label.

items.name: var xValue: AXDataPointValue
items.desc: The value of the X-axis for the data point.

items.name: var yValue: AXDataPointValue?
items.desc: The value of the Y-axis for the data point.

items.name: enum AXDataPoint.Value
items.desc: Constants that describe types of data values.

items.name: var label: String?
items.desc: The label for the data point.

items.name: var attributedLabel: NSAttributedString?
items.desc: An attributed version of the label for the data point.
